name: Ring of Power
description: A mysterious ring that enhances all abilities.
plaggComment: Shiny ring! I prefer cheese rings, but this works too.

name: Amulet of Life
description: Grants the wearer increased vitality and health regeneration.
plaggComment: Life force! Like the eternal power of cheese preservation!

name: Plagg's Miraculous
description: The ultimate artifact of destruction and cheese mastery.
plaggComment: MY MIRACULOUS! The ultimate cheese-powered artifact!

name: Crystal of Wisdom
description: Enhances magical abilities and mana capacity.
plaggComment: Smart crystal! Probably contains ancient cheese knowledge.
